Changelog

chat2doc 0.0.4.9000

NEW FEATURES

  • Support xAI Grok. (#4).
    • add functions
      • list_models_xai()
  • Support authoring.
    • add functions
      • chat2markdown(). only manpage
      • cat_chat()
      • extract_subtitles()

chat2doc 0.0.3

NEW FEATURES

  • Support xAI Grok. (#3).
    • add functions
      • chat_grok()

MINOR CHANGES

  • Support xAI Grok. (#3).
    • change functions for Grok
      • regist_api_key()
      • set_api_key()

chat2doc 0.0.2

MAJOR CHANGES

  • API key 핸들링 함수의 통합. (#2).
    • remove functions
      • regist_openai_key()
      • regist_anthropic_key()
      • regist_google_key()
      • set_openai_key()
      • set_anthropic_key()
      • set_google_key()
    • add functions
      • regist_api_key()
      • set_api_key()

chat2doc 0.0.1

NEW FEATURES

  • 채팅 결과의 요약 및 편집 기능 추가. (#1).
    • edit_openai()
